      • isAttacked

        boolean isAttacked(int targetSquare,
                   int attackerColor)
        Returns whether the targetSquare is attacked by any piece from the attackerColor. We will backtrack from the targetSquare to find the piece.
        Parameters:
        targetSquare - the target Square.
        attackerColor - the attacker Color.
        Returns:
        whether the targetSquare is attacked.
